user_input: Which NGAP procedure is used for inter-system load balancing? [3GPP Release 17]
response: uplink ran configuration transfer.
reference: uplink ran configuration transfer.

user_input: What is covered by enhanced application layer support for V2X services? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ev2x application layer support for vehicletoeverything v2x services.
reference: advanced v2x services.

user_input: What does the Load-Balancing steering mode do? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the loadbalancing steering mode splits the traffic of a data flow in uplink and downlink direction separately across the 3gpp and the non3gpp accesses typically with a split percentage eg 20 on 3gpp and 80 on non3gpp however in rel17 the loadbalancing steering mode can provide an autonomous loadbalance indicator allowing the ue and upf to freely select their own percentages which may change over time to maximize throughput.
reference: splits the traffic of a data flow across 3gpp and non3gpp accesses.

user_input: What is the main objective of intent driven management for service or network management? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the main objective of intent driven management is to allow the consumer to express an intent for managing the network or services and obtain the feedback of intent evaluation results.
reference: to reduce the complexity of management for network resources.

user_input: What does MINT stand for? [3GPP Release 17]
response: mental health indicator threshold.
reference: minimization of service interruption.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Media Streaming AF Event Exposure work item? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the media streaming af event exposure work item is to develop specifications for the event exposure services provided by the 5g media streaming 5gms application function af specifically regarding the exposure of mediaspecific data related to user equipment ue mobility communication and experience as well as support for encrypted and highvalue content.
reference: to support data collection and event exposure by an af to event consumers.

user_input: What is the purpose of load-balancing steering mode enhancements? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to maximize the aggregated throughput of data flows by enabling autonomous loadbalancing and allowing ues and upfs to independently select split percentages based on rtt measurements.
reference: to enable the ue and upf to freely select split percentages for each access type.

user_input: What is a capability added in the V2X Application Enabler (VAE) layer? [3GPP Release 17]
response: supporting dynamic group management.
reference: v2x service discovery.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Edge Data Network (EDN) in enabling edge applications? [3GPP Release 17]
response: enabling the local data network that hosts edge application servers edge enabler server and edge configuration server to interact with the 3gpp core network thus enabling discovery of the eas and other functions.
reference: to host the edge application servers and edge enabler server ees.

user_input: What are the three features specified in TS 23.304 for 5G ProSe Direct Communication over NR based PC5 reference point? [3GPP Release 17]
response: broadcast mode groupcast mode and unicast mode.
reference: broadcast mode groupcast mode unicast mode.

user_input: How is service continuity supported for specific slice(s)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: multicarrier resource sharing and resource repartitioning.
reference: through multicarrier resource sharing or resource repartitioning.

user_input: How can UE power consumption due to false paging alarms be reduced? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ue power consumption due to false paging alarms can be reduced through subgrouping of ues monitoring the same po paging occasion whereby each subgroup is associated with a unique subgroup id and the group has a maximum number of subgroups up to 8 additionally associated paging early indication pei is used to determine the subgroup id with options to use cncontrolled or ueidentified subgrouping and a ue will monitor pdcch for paging if its subgroup is paged or monitoring in its po if unable to find the associated pei configuration or if in rrcinactive state.
reference: by dividing ues into multiple subgroups.

user_input: What is the purpose of Generic Bootstrapping Architecture (GBA) in 5GC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to establish a shared cryptographic material based on 3gpp credentials and enable application functions in the network and on the user equipment ue side.
reference: to enable application functions to establish shared cryptographic material.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Small Data Transmission (SDT) feature in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to provide minimal network impact for sending and receiving small amounts of data while allowing for minimal signalling overhead network resources usage and delay for reallocation.
reference: to enable data transmission in the rrcinactive state for ues with infrequent data traffic.

user_input: What functionality does Signalling Based Activation provide? [3GPP Release 17]
response: device triggering functionality.
reference: request for end user service performance information for one specific ue.

user_input: What are the enhancements for idle/inactive-mode UE power saving in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: paging enhancements to reduce ue reception power consumption in idleinactive mode and provision of potential trscsirs occasions available in connected mode to idleinactivemode ues.
reference: paging enhancements to reduce ue reception power consumption.

user_input: How does a Multi-USIM UE indicate to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to CM-IDLE state? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a multiusim ue indicates to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to cmidle state by sending a reject paging indication in a service request message.
reference: by sending a reject paging response to the network.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Slice-Maximum Bit Rate (S-MBR)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the slicemaximum bit rate smbr is used to limit the aggregate bit rate that can be expected to be provided across all gbr and nongbr qos flows for all pdu sessions associated with a same snssai.
reference: to limit the aggregate data rate per ue across all qos flows for all pdu sessions associated with a slice.

user_input: What aspects of the Disaster Roaming service are specified in TS 22.011 and TS 22.261? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ts 22011 and ts 22261 specify aspects related to the provision and management of disaster roaming service including registration procedures charging information collection and mobility restrictions.
reference: service requirements for the 5g system.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Provision of potential TRS/CSI-RS occasion(s) to idle/inactive-mode UEs? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to reduce power consumption while in extended idle mode by allowing the ues to sleep for a longer duration before waking up for their paging occasion.
reference: to reduce ue power consumption for synchronization.
